meanings.definition: A substance that kills white blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The leucocidin attacked the white blood cells in the body.
meanings.sent2: Doctors studied the effects of leucocidin on immune cells.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous leucocidin played a prank on the white blood cells.
meanings.sent4: The leucocidin was like a silent assassin targeting the white blood cells.
meanings.sent5: The leucocidin's impact on white blood cells was devastating.

meanings.definition: A toxin produced by certain bacteria that destroys leukocytes.
meanings.sent1: The bacteria released leucocidin to harm the leukocytes.
meanings.sent2: Scientists researched the effects of leucocidin on immune system cells.
meanings.sent3: The leucocidin toxin pulled a prank on the leukocytes in the body.
meanings.sent4: The leucocidin toxin acted like a ruthless enemy to the leukocytes.
meanings.sent5: The leucocidin toxin's destruction of leukocytes was alarming.
